long_description: Protect your rear end with the SKS X-Blade 29er seatpost-mounted rear fender, which quickly and easily mounts to your big-wheeled 29er bike for on-demand protection on trails and roads. Single "blade" design sits over your bike's rear wheel, preventing mud, muck and trail debris from splashing up your backside. Mounting system attaches fender to your bike's seatpost quickly and easily, and allows for easy angle adjustment, letting you dial in the coverage and clearance.
short_description: Protect your rear end with the SKS X-Blade 29er seatpost-mounted rear fender, which quickly and easily mounts to your big-wheeled 29er bike for on-demand protection on trails and roads.
